    • createBooking

      @PostMapping("/create") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createBooking(@RequestBody UserBookingDto bookingDto) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException
      Create a new booking.
      Parameters:
      bookingDto - the booking data transfer object containing the booking details
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with the created booking
      Throws:
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException

    • createMultipleBookings

      Create multiple bookings at once.
      Parameters:
      bookingDtos - an array of UserBookingDto each containing booking details
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with the created bookings
      Throws:
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException

      Parameters:
      bookingId - the ID of the booking to confirm
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with the confirmation status

    • getAllBookings

      @GetMapping("/all") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllBookings(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size)
      Retrieve all bookings with pagination.
      Parameters:
      page - the page number of the pagination
      size - the size of the page
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a BookingPaginationResponse

    • getAllBookingsByStartDate

      @GetMapping("allByStartDate/{startDate}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllBookingsByStartDate(@PathVariable String startDate)
      Retrieve all bookings by start date.
      Parameters:
      startDate - the start date for which to retrieve bookings
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with bookings starting on the given date

    • getAvailableHoursByDateAndSpace

      @GetMapping("availableHours/{spaceId}/{date}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAvailableHoursByDateAndSpace(@PathVariable String spaceId, @PathVariable String date)
      Get available booking hours for a given date and space.
      Parameters:
      spaceId - the ID of the space
      date - the date for checking availability
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with available booking hours

    • getBookingsByStatus

      @GetMapping("/status/{status}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getBookingsByStatus(@PathVariable String status)
      Retrieve bookings by status.
      Parameters:
      status - the status to filter bookings
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with bookings having the specified status

      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose booking is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with the booking of the specified user

      Parameters:
      bookingId - the ID of the booking to retrieve
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with the booking

    • updateBooking

      @PatchMapping("update/{bookingId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateBooking(@PathVariable String bookingId, @RequestBody BookingDto booking)
      Update a booking.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the ID of the booking to update
      booking - the updated booking data
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with the updated booking

      @DeleteMapping("/delete/{bookingId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteBooking(@PathVariable String bookingId)
      Delete a booking.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the ID of the booking to delete
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity indicating success or failure
